Package grave_escape.game

Class Game

java.lang.Object
grave_escape.game.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
KeyListener, EventListener
public class Game extends Object implements KeyListener
The Game class acts as the main controller for the game, handling the overall game flow, player interactions, and game state management.

  • Constructor Summary

    Game(CardLayout cardLayout, JPanel mainPanel, Difficulty difficulty, GameMode gameMode, Level level)
    Constructs a Game object and initializes the game panel, levels, and state.

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(CardLayout cardLayout, JPanel mainPanel, Difficulty difficulty, GameMode gameMode, Level level)
      Constructs a Game object and initializes the game panel, levels, and state.
      Parameters:
      cardLayout - The CardLayout used for switching between panels.
      mainPanel - The main JPanel containing all game components.
      difficulty - The difficulty level of the game.
      gameMode - The selected game mode (e.g., Practice, Campaign).
      level - The initial level to be played.
